descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11696-1-1330544396.jpg[/img][/center]

I was bothered by some of the Lights in Game being missplaced, so it looked unrealistic for me to be dark around a torchcan or my face not being lit up by it. So I placed the source llights in a more realistic correct way. With vanilla, the missplaced Lights doesnt get much noticed, but as you use any mod making nights darker, you will to start to noticed it a lot more ;)

At the moment it´s just about 6 Location in Whiterun. I am sure there is a lot more, but this were the ones bothered me the most.

Its a hobby mod, so I will update it time to time with more corrected lights I discover to be particulary annoying. So its not my goal to replace all the lights on the game, that would be almost impossible as often this missplaced ligths was a bethesda design choice aswell.


I included 2 Versions, the standard one for Vanilla and any other Lighting/darker Nights mod, so as one specially for the Real Colors Real Nights mod since it uses a dynamic light and a different light flickering system so  my Zfix needed a fix for it ^^


Thanks to aLaaa and RPGWizard for their Suggestions and Support. So as to Tawor, just because :D
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Use the Mod Manager to Install / Deinstall
or Manually copy the desired .esp into the Skyrim/Data Folder, to deinstall, just delete it.

ZFixed Lights.esp for Vanila or other Lighting Mods.
Zfixed Lights RCRN.esp for Real Colors and real Nights Mod (Legacy, Classic or Pure)

New: The RDMR Realistic Devs Menu Replacer - Fun + Awesome Music [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12018]RDMR[/url]


-------------------- Future updates ----------------------------

Things I am working on.. Fixed a couple more of lights in whiterun...

Sedrid´s Used Store in Windhelm, a room with 2 Light Sources.. but not lamps! Looks weird..
